I think we have a set of test that are impossible to create with "only one error" - here's a PR to add MULTIPLE_EXCEPTIONS as a EOFException that indicates any exception is accepted. https://github.com/ethereum/execution-spec-tests/pull/759
Open to other solutions.  In the edited test Besu and evmone agree the code is invalid, they differ in the exception raised as there are multiple things that are wrong depending on the order you do checks.
